question.title: Question: 1
question.questionText: I am………….milk every day.

question.title: Question: 2
question.questionText: She has…………in a small village

question.title: Question: 3
question.questionText: When I was a child, I didn’t……………chocolate but now I eat a lot.

question.title: Question: 4
question.questionText: You must…………….English for long hours.

question.title: Question: 5
question.questionText: I have……………….English everyday.

question.title: Question: 6
question.questionText: I am……………for myself.

question.title: Question: 7
question.questionText: Her son is…………television for five hours a day.

question.title: Question: 8
question.questionText: I……………….a big chocolate cake a day but I stopped three years ago.

question.title: Question: 9
question.questionText: I am…………..a cup of coffee in the morning.

question.title: Question: 10
question.questionText: Peter……………a bike, now he has a car.

question.title: Question : 1
question.questionText:
Far from killing the cinema industry, video film rental has revived the public’s interest in going to the cinema. As a result, multi-screen cinemas or multiple cinema complexes have appeared in the main towns. These cinemas can have up to 20 screens and show a great (1)______ (vary) of films. Renting films is an important (2)______ (time); in 1990 over 374 million video tapes were rented. People also buy tapes and presents. However, the (3) ______ (common) use of video recorders is to record programmes from the TV to watch at a more (4)______ (convenience) time. Far from encouraging (5)______ (excess) TV watching, video recorders have been used mainly to control the times at which people watch. This also (6)______ (contribution) to a decline in the number of hours of TV people watch, because they watch videos instead. During the 1980s, there was an enormous boom in the number of people buying video recorders, and shops (7)______ (expansion) to provide the video tapes they wanted. Video viewing became such a way of life, along with take-away food and an (8)______ (increase) interest in wine drinking, that the perfect night socialising at been has been (9)______ (joke) described as consisting of a video, a wine box, and a take-away curry. “Do you fancy coming over to my place to watch a video?” is a (10)______ (type) invitation.
Question (1)

question.title: Question: 2
question.questionText:

However, the (3) ______ (common) use of video recorders is to record programmes from the TV to watch at a more (4)______ (convenience) time. Far from encouraging (5)______ (excess) TV watching, video recorders have been used mainly to control the times at which people watch. Question (2)

question.title: Question: 1
question.questionText: She is ....... singer I’ve ever met.

question.title: Question: 2
question.questionText: Mary is ....... responsible as Peter.

question.title: Question: 3
question.questionText: It is ....... in the city than it is in the country.

question.title: Question: 4
question.questionText: She is ....... student in my class.

question.title: Question: 5
question.questionText: The English test was ....... than I thought it would be

question.title: Question: 6
question.questionText: English is thought to be ....... than Math.

question.title: Question: 7
question.questionText: Jupiter is ....... planet in the solar system.

question.title: Question: 8
question.questionText: My house is ....... hers.

question.title: Question: 9
question.questionText: Her office is ....... away than mine.

question.title: Question: 10
question.questionText: He did the test ……… I did

question.title: Question: 11
question.questionText: My new sofa is ....... than the old one.

question.title: Question: 12
question.questionText: My sister dances ……… than me.

question.title: Question: 13
question.questionText: My bedroom is ....... room in my house.

question.title: Question: 14
question.questionText: This road is ....... than that road.

question.title: Question: 15
question.questionText: He drives …… his brother.

question.title: Question: 16
question.questionText: It was ....... day of the year.

question.title: Question: 1
question.questionText: My husband is waiting for me. I….. not be late.

question.title: Question: 2
question.questionText: You …… start eating better

question.title: Question: 3
question.questionText: I … study tonight, but I think I’ll watch TV instead

question.title: Question: 4
question.questionText: You …… take care of that cut on your hand soon, or it will get infected.

question.title: Question: 5
question.questionText: You have got a toothache. Perhaps you ….. see a dentist.

question.title: Question: 6
question.questionText: There’ll be a lot of traffic tomorrow. We…… leave early.

question.title: Although her visit was ______ (expect), we made her welcome just the same.
question.questionText: Although her visit was ______ (expect), we made her welcome just the same.

question.title: I know all the boys who live in the _______ (neighbour)
question.questionText: I know all the boys who live in the _______ (neighbour)

question.title: He doesn’t agree with the _______ (believe) that there is life on other planets.
question.questionText: He doesn’t agree with the _______ (believe) that there is life on other planets.

question.title: He examined the parcel _______ (suspect), as he had no idea what it could be.
question.questionText: He examined the parcel _______ (suspect), as he had no idea what it could be.
